_comments.PostToolUse:Write|Edit: Fires after Claude writes or edits a file.
_comments.PostToolUse:command: Runs scripts/check_python.sh after writing or editting. This script runs ruff and py_compile to enforce style and catch syntax errors.
_comments.PostToolUse:prompt: After writing or editting, asks the model whether a test file should be created. And if yes, it creates a test file.
_comments.PreToolUse:Bash: Fires before Claude executes bash command to block dangerous commands.
_comments.PreToolUse:command: Runs scripts/block_force_push.sh to prevent git push --force and protect git history.

hooks.prompt: A Python file was written or updated. Decide whether a pytest test file is needed. If needed, create a test file covering the main public functions.
